name: Wish List
description:
My deepest wish leads me here. 

Still have words for my beloved. 

After the last moment, I am afraid they will be unspoken.

____________________

Solo experimental demo from Jinda Li

GN! Online Jam: Neighbours Game Jam (GNOJ#6)

Jam Theme: Relation

- Puzzles, about the relations between words and the environment

- Narratives, in respect for the victims in aircraft accidents and sympathy for their relatives

____________________

Move: WASD

Look: Mouse

Interact: Mouse Left Button / E
